title: Inubaka: Crazy For Dogs, Volume 1
description: All alone except for her loyal mutt Lupan, 18-year-old Suguri moves from the countryside to the big city to find a job and a new life!When she accepts a job at a pet store, she meets a variety of dogs and owners, each with own quirky personality. What she lacks inexperience, she makes up for with her natural rapport with all things wagging and fluffy!
author: Yukiya Sakuragi
